name: Mr_Terminal
description:
I spent a lot of time making the terminal in the game and forgot the game design and art etc., I had many good ideas but I try to make something bigger than I could do in 3 days 

STORY  (That You Will Not Any Of It In The Game)

you are the best world Inventor and a lousy business enterprise company kidnapped him to make him make danger weapon to melt all the ice of the world to force people to live in their space hotel that makes him control the world and make him rich then put hem in a virtual world to make him work faster.

and you make a robot to escape the company with the robot("Bruno")

and destroy the last computer to win
